programme.desc: Floating Farms, Bangladesh - Glitch's trip to a funky floating farm becomes a rescue mission on a fast-flowing river.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep41
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Waterspout Wipeout - A race between Xuli, Lars and Glitch gets serious when a tornado hits the Academy Island.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep9
programme.desc: Diesel Do Right - After being scolded for making a mistake, Diesel plays a trick on Rebecca to try and get the other engines in trouble.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Cake Relocate - Cake is tired of living in the fridge, so Sarah & Duck help him think about where else he would like to stay.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Extra Bounce - John's yellow bouncy ball is too bouncy, but Sarah thinks she knows where the solution can be found...

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bubbles - Stanley cleans Cynthia's bus, but each time he does it keeps getting dirty again. It's so dirty by the end, he invents a super-duper cleaning machine that makes a sea of bubbles.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep2
programme.desc: House - Myrtle's aunt Cressy is coming to stay, and she needs Stanley to make her a bed for her. This escalates into Stanley building her a whole set of rooms outside Myrtles actual house.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep58
programme.desc: Same Old Story - Monty wonders whether tales must always stay the same, or if the endings can sometimes be different. He ponders this as his grandmother reads him a story.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep11
programme.desc: It's time to dance - Gran Gran busts a groove when she teaches JoJo the moves to a traditional Saint Lucian dance. JoJo finds that learning a dance can take time, before realising she can put her own twist on it.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep21
programme.desc: Tina - Tired of being told what to do, Bluey and Bingo enlist their giant invisible friend Tina to show Mum and Dad who's boss. Now they can do anything they want, until Mum and Dad rebel.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep22
programme.desc: Whale Watching - Bluey promises her customer, Bingo, the best tour ever in a game of Whale Watching, but they need Mum and Dad to join in, and they are too tired to play after a late night.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Family Meeting - When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep7
programme.desc: The Pen Pal Badge - Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep6
programme.desc: The Being Quiet Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep5
programme.desc: The Get Indoors Badge - A weather warning from Duggee's barometer leads the Squirrels to round up the creatures.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Mount Etna, Italy - When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Orange - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's the daring Orange attempting to cross the stage on a tightrope, if she manages to ignore any distractions.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Cucumber - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's Cucumber performing Cool Under Pressure while trying to not let any obstacle ruin her calm routine.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Broccoli Alone - Supertato is out chasing a milkshake robot and leaves Broccoli in charge of Tato Tower. Evil Pea tries to take over the tower, but Broccoli puts on a great defence.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Pea Repeats - Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep91
programme.desc: Footprints - Tinky Winky, Dipsy and LaaLaa follow a trail of muddy footprints and find Po in bed with very muddy feet. The Noo-Noo cleans off the mud.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep23
programme.desc: W - Dee encourages a friend to say 'w', and they go on an adventure around the sound. They play in some water, see a worm and wear some wigs!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Pop Goes Circus - The friends are joining Hooper's circus school. But when Plom struggles to find a skill he's good at, will he be able to earn his circus school certificate?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Messy-power - Hey, who turned out the lights? Messy goes to OKIDO and finds out electricity can lead to music, lights and disco dancing!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep37
programme.desc: The Decider - The Heelers and Lucky's family get together to watch the big game, a fun family experiences that gets a little tense.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep36
programme.desc: Dirt - Judo desperately wants to play in the dirt with Bluey and Bingo, but she is not supposed to get herself dirty.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep1
programme.desc: The Carrot Badge - The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep15
programme.desc: The Taj Mahal, India - The grimbots attach a bit of the Taj Mahal to GrimHQ. It remains to be seen whether the Go Jetters can fix the glitch.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Mount Etna, Italy - When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Trains - All aboard the Dad Train! Bingo goes from home to daycare to her job at the vet every morning, but there's trouble on the line as a mischievous Bluey throws everyone off schedule.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Mum School - Bluey plays mum to a brood of bouncy balloons, including an irrepressible floater named Greenie. But she soon discovers that mothering is much harder than she imagined.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Chalicothere & Claw - Andy breaks a museum artefact, and must travel 30 million years back in time to replace it. Once there, he tracks down a chalicothere but gets chased by a swarm of prehistoric hornets.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mission: Train Station - Kika is a golden Labrador and guide dog for her owner Dr Amit, who is blind. She is trained to use her supersight to help him do as many things as he can by himself. Together, they make the best team!

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Sunbird and Day Gecko - This episode features the sunbird and the day gecko. Their wild connection is they are both perfect pollinators.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep13
programme.desc: Ye Old Piratey Butlaarrrs - Captain Captain has been reading about how captains of yonder years had 'butlaarrrs' in the Olde Book of Piratey Historrry. Captain Captain wonders if Sandy and Seaweed could try being her butlers!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep43
programme.desc: The Looking After Badge - Outside the clubhouse a large crowd has gathered around a hot air balloon.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep42
programme.desc: The Organising Badge - Roly is trying to force a very large plastic ball into the bin, but it flies out!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep41
programme.desc: The Grandparents Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are tidying up, its Bring your Grandparents to Squirrel Club Day.

programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.desc: Ukrainian musician Kateryna gives concerts all around Japan playing the bandura. Russia's invasion prompted her to support displaced people in Japan, hoping her music will bring peace to her homeland.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS - Predatory finishing & net-busting missiles from long range. A celebration of Quique de Lucas one of LaLigas longest serving attacking talents.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC312DuPlessisvsStrickland
programme.desc: UFC returns down under to Sydney, Austalia, where Middleweight champion Dricus Du Plessis defends his crown against Sean Strickland, the man he took it from, and undefeated TUF 23 winner Tatiana Suarez aims to unseat 2-time champion Zhang Weili for the Women's Strawweight title. Plus more on UFC Reloaded!

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep11
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: ROAD TO UFC SEASON 4 Ep1
programme.desc: UFC Performance Institute Shanghai once again this weekend will host back-to-back days of the opening round for ROAD TO UFC Season 4, the hugely successful win and advance tournament that will take top MMA prospects from Asia Pacific and give them a pathway to a UFC contract. programme.title: UFC Connected Ep704
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Kayla Harrison, Fighter Focus: Jim Miller, Ultimate Access: Chute Boxe, Day 1: Cody Garbrandt - Olympic Judo world champion Kayla Harrison details her transition into MMA, revealing her resilience through childhood abuse, and channeling her pain into athletic triumphs. The UFCs marathon man looks back at this record-breaking career and details his approach to the fight game that has seen him compete at the sports highest level for decades. Exclusive access to a special ceremony held at the original site of the Chute Boxe academy where Charles Oliveira is awarded his black belt by Chute Boxe founder Rudimar Fedrigo. Former Bantamweight champion Cody Garbrandt looks back at the impressive UFC debut performance that launched his decorated career.
